name: Crystal Tracker (The Prologue)
description:
Crystal Tracker is a 2D that follows the story of Tsila and her trusted spirit-friend, Swibu as they embark on a dangerous journey to free the human and spirit world from an evil witch.

In Crystal Tracker (The Prologue) you explore a mysterious forest, searching for crystals to aid you on your quest.

Listen to the soundtrack on SoundCloud.

Follow us on Instagram.
